title: Can someone Please just look at my ban.

replies.body: me and my cousin have been seen online together.

replies.body: You have to wait. Everyone waits patiently for their appeals to be looked at. We'll get to it but we have other things to deal with first, people who have waited longer. Please stop creating spam threads.
